library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gapminder)
```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
liveData <- raster("data/HARV_dsmCrop.tif")

```

```{r}
summary(liveData)
```
```{r}
str(liveData)
```
```{r}
liveData <- as.data.frame(liveData,xy=TRUE)
ggplot() + geom_raster(data=liveData, aes(x=x, y=y, fill=HARV_dsmCrop))
+ scale_fill_viridis_a()
```
